Package com.example.goldencarrot.data.model.user

Class UserImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.goldencarrot.data.model.user.UserImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
User
Direct Known Subclasses:
FacilityUserImpl
public class UserImpl extends Object implements User
Implementation of the User interface. This class provides concrete implementations for the methods defined in the User interface. It holds user-related data such as email, user type, name, phone number, user ID, and notification preferences for administrators and organizers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor

    Constructor to initialize the user with all necessary attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserImpl

      public UserImpl()
      Default constructor for creating an empty UserImpl instance.

    • UserImpl

      public UserImpl(String email, String userType, String name, Optional<String> phoneNumber, Boolean administratorNotification, Boolean organizerNotification, String userProfileImage) throws Exception
      Constructor to initialize the user with all necessary attributes.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email.
      userType - the type of the user (e.g., Organizer, Admin).
      name - the user's name.
      phoneNumber - the user's phone number, wrapped in an Optional.
      administratorNotification - whether the user wants notifications from administrators.
      organizerNotification - whether the user wants notifications from organizers.
      userProfileImage - the users profile image
      Throws:
      Exception - if the userType is invalid.

    • UserImpl

      public UserImpl(String userId)
      Constructor that initializes the user with only a user ID (for cases where other attributes are set later).
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID to set.
